safety_edibility_notes: Protected under Migratory Bird Treaty Act in USA. Historically eaten in some cultures during times of scarcity. Strong gamey flavor, typically avoided.
safety_warning_text: Ravens may dive at and harass humans near nests. Pecks can cause minor injuries. Ravens remember faces and may mob perceived threats.
safety_summary: Ravens pose minimal physical danger but are highly intelligent and remember individuals who threaten them. They may mob, dive, and call at perceived threats for years.
safety_contraindications: Do not harass or throw objects at ravens
Do not kill or trap without permits
encounter_protocol: Ravens will generally avoid conflict. If mobbed, leave the area calmly. Wear hat if repeatedly harassed. Do not retaliate.
facial_recognition: Ravens can recognize and remember individual human faces for years and communicate threats to other ravens.
legal_protection_status: Migratory Bird Treaty Act (USA), protected in most jurisdictions
